text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.smoothCa: interfers with Cinematic Mode but it shouldn't be anything negative.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.hideHand: While enabled, zooming hides your hands.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.smoothTr: Enables smooth transitions when zooming in and out.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.reduceSe: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.zoomTogg: Enables the ability to toggle zooming.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.zoomScro: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.option.zoomDivi: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
text.autoconfig.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Config
